name: Base Clock
description:
There are strange clock like things everywhere, which teleport you to them every 10 seconds!

Explore this metroidvania and find all 10 orbs.

Controls:

Keyboard

Arrow Keys/WASD - Move

UP/W - Activate Clock checkpoint

SPACE - Jump

C - Dash (if unlocked)

Xbox Controller

Left Stick/D-Pad - Move

UP/B - Activate Clock checkpoint

X/Right Trigger - Dash (if unlocked)

Hints:

Every 10 seconds you get teleported back to the last activated checkpoint

You must manually activate them

You can reset the timer by activating a checkpoint

Made with my own engine tako,

for Ludum Dare 51  - Every 10 seconds

Thanks for playing!

So far only tested in Chrome, but I assume the sound in Safari does not work, or at all.
